class.rdfs:comment: For a given health insurance plan, the specification for costs and coverage of prescription drugs.
class.rdfs:label: HealthPlanFormulary

schema:healthPlanCostSharing.rdfs:comment: Whether The costs to the patient for services under this network or formulary.
schema:healthPlanCostSharing.rdfs:label: healthPlanCostSharing

schema:healthPlanDrugTier.rdfs:comment: The tier(s) of drugs offered by this formulary or insurance plan.
schema:healthPlanDrugTier.rdfs:label: healthPlanDrugTier

schema:offersPrescriptionByMail.rdfs:comment: Whether prescriptions can be delivered by mail.
schema:offersPrescriptionByMail.rdfs:label: offersPrescriptionByMail
